code: import React from"react";import Forecast from"./Forecast";var Results=function Results(_ref){var forecast=_ref.forecast;return React.createElement("div",{className:"results"},!forecast.length?React.createElement("h1",null,"No Forecast To Show"):forecast.map(function(dayForecast){return React.createElement(Forecast,{key:dayForecast.id,date:dayForecast.applicable_date,maxTemp:dayForecast.max_temp.toFixed(2),minTemp:dayForecast.min_temp.toFixed(2),description:dayForecast.weather_state_name,icon:dayForecast.weather_state_abbr,wind:"".concat(dayForecast.wind_speed.toFixed(2)," MPH, ").concat(dayForecast.wind_direction_compass)});}));};export default Results;
